My husband placed my first Nuuly order as my Christmas gift (I'm 16 weeks pregnant and am having trouble fitting into my normal clothes, so he thought a rental service would be a good option). I loved it, and lived in it.

links_reviews_title: Large on Purpose -- SO many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Out of all the cute, non-sweatshirt material items I rented, this one by FAR got the most compliments & was worn the most! It runs large, but that's what I was hoping for. I love the oversized sleeves and feel. Wore with leggings and got lots of compliments!
Super cute and soft, great for heading to yoga or just throwing on with leggings. Runs large but I think that’s intentional.

I read the reviews before adding this to my nuuly, and even though everyone said it ran oversized, I didn't think a medium would be a problem. Be warned: it is VERY big. That being said, it is super cute. Love the color and very comfortable. Got a ton of compliments. But seriously, SIZE DOWN.
This sweatshirt is huge. It’s shaped like box. I could have fit three of me inside. The white and black was a nice color combination.
Cute for yoga and camping outside! Runs really big. I got a medium not thinking about it and could have gone xs or s. Looks cute with yoga pants and skinny jeans

links_reviews_title: Obsessed. Oversized but that’s what you want from a cozy sweatshirt. The sleeves are awesome. The pockets are big enough to fit actual items. The half zip is awesome and the hood is also super spacious.
links_reviews_text: Perfect to run errands in, around the house, watching tv. The perfect lounge wear.
The ultimate post workout, just woke up, cold evenings at the beach sweatshirt. Is very over sized but is supposed to be.
So soft and comfy. Perfect cute but cozy sweatshirt, but it does run large so I recommend to size down

Finally a day where it was below 80 degree outside so I could give this pullover a shot. Styled it with a blank tank underneath and a pair of capri yoga pants for a comfy look. Love how wide the top can get when the zipper is fully unzipped; offers the option of hanging it off one shoulder. The color is perfect with the tan I got over the weekend! The sleeves could be a tad longer, but with wearing it in July, I can push them up a tad and make it work. Overall, I love this pullover. Thinking about buying it!
didn't even realize it was reversible, fun surprise! sized down to a small and it was still plenty roomy. easy way to make jeans and a tee into a special outfit.

This was really big on me but I did still wear it. It is a fun interesting jacket. I did like the inside print better than the outside, wish it was reversible. Size down two sizes to be fitted. The cuffs were a little worn and discolored.
Got tons of compliments on this. Many from total strangers on the street!

Was unable to wear this jacket because I was absolutely swimming in it. I usually wear a small, only medium was available but figured it would be ok under thick items of clothing. Nope. Wish I had gotten an XS.
This jacket is great looking, but really worn. The white parts were dark and discolored like they were rubbed against a dark color jean. The print is great, but the fit ran extremely big.

I really liked this jacket and enjoyed dressing it up and down. The sleeves are insanely long, so be aware . I am tall, and I had to roll them and push them up all the time. But it feels great and is really beautiful in person.
It was extremely hard to give this one back. I might even rent again to buy it!
Loved the pattern on this jacket but was too big even for a small. I usually love wearing things oversized but it was a little too big. Would definitely go for an XS again.

I loved this jacket! The wristband is a bit dirty-looking/faded, which is why I took off one star, but it's still an excellent jacket. Got loads of complements. Not very warm, but fine for weather in the 50s.
Pretty strange fit to this bomber and the material didn't fall as a standard bomber would (it's more quilted, so liked to bunch up and felt pretty bulky).

links_reviews_title: Loved This Jacket but Too Wild to Keep
links_reviews_text: This jacket was so fun to wear. Not keeping it because it's still quite expensive and the pattern is so unique that I don't think I'd get a lot of use out of it. However, it is quite warm since it's double-layered with a quilted fabric inside, and runs really large so it feels very cozy. So fun with a vintage tee and a mom jean.
It’s a really pretty jacket and I got so many compliments. But it is VERY oversized. I am definitely a 4/6 and usually order a S/M, but I ordered a XS/S here, and even that was too big.
Definitely a cute jacket but the white part of the jacket and the cuffs were rather dirty and had a blue tint. Not sure if this was part of the style or not.

This was a fun jacket- not good for the coldest days, but keeps warm on a chilly day. It runs very large as the other reviews suggest. If you are a true XS this will be too big for you. My one complaint is that it smelled like it hadn’t been cleaned - and I did not enjoy smelling the previous renter while wearing it. That’s why 4 stars.
got so many compliments and decided to keep it! runs a bit large, could have definitely gone down a size to XS.
Very cute, pattern is fall seasonal. Free people is known to run a bit bigger so there was some room even in the xs - good for a few times wear

Very oversize! Even in the xs it was super baggy on me which isn't really my style but I still had some fun wearing it in a loungey way or with a form fitting dress and heels to balance it out and make it feel less frumpy.
Really big, especially for a medium. This was MASSIVE, like it wasn't oversized, it looked stupid.
This jacket runs bigger than I expected. I’m 5’3” and it was a little long and baggy. Sooo many people complimented the jacket and asked where I got it- such an awesome pop for a basic outfit.
Perfect for fall!!! Love the oversized fit so can layer easily when it gets chilly out
I have always wanted to try a bomber and I’m so glad I rented this one! On the warmer side and I love the design. It’s massive on me though, so I would recco sizing down.
I wouldn't size up in this jacket. I got the small and wish I would have gotten the xs. Love the pattern, will be great for the fall.
LOVE this jacket. It is definitely a bit large, but it looks really cool in an oversized style.
This jacket is beautiful! It is oversized, so if you’re looking for a slimmer fit, size down a size (or two really). It’s super comfy and a good medium weight jacket.

This jacket is beautiful! Super nice material, amazing colors, and good over-sized fit! You will definitely need to size down though, I usually wear a Medium so that's what I ordered and I could have really used a Small or maybe even X-Small
Very comfy and soft. Gorgeous pattern and fabric. I ordered a medium to be safe.. I go between medium and small..should have gone with small, but love it..

I’m 5’10” and this jacket was so oversized that I had to scrunch up my sleeves to make it comfortable. The sleeves are too long and it’s a really baggy look that isn’t flattering. If you like feeling like you’re drowning in your clothes, this is for you. If not, I’d suggest adding something else to your cart.

links_reviews_title: Two for the Rent of One!
links_reviews_text: LOVE this reversible jacket!! I'd been eyeing it on Free People for ages, and almost squealed when I saw it listed in Nuuly's assortment. It's such a unique statement piece. I'm partial to the vibrant paisley / patchwork / floral side, but both sides are really unique...and basically you get two statement jackets with this one! I was so excited I sprang for this in 90 degree July weather so I only got to wear it indoors once, but will definitely be renting this one again! Super soft material is a plus. Oh, and it runs large, so I suggest sizing down for a more fitted look.

wore with high waisted light wash jeans and booties, got a million compliments! it is def oversized, so size down if you're between sizes, and it is sheer so I wore a nude colored cami bra and worked great.
I wore this with skinny Jean's and boots just for a normal day out running errands. It was true to size and fit comfortably

links_reviews_title: Great top for work and going out!
links_reviews_text: I love this top! It's great for work and for going out to dinner with friends. I paired with jeans and block heels for work and it was perfect. I got so many compliments on the shirt. It does run large, so I ordered a size down from my typical size.

This top is absolutely adorable and I have gotten so many compliments on it! However it is very sheer and the shoulders are wider than I thought. I would suggest sizing down if you have narrow shoulders.
I loved this! I wore it on vacation in Belize and wanted to wear it everyday. It was low cut though so be aware you definitely can’t wear a bra.
This is so cute and perfect for a beach cover-up. The v-neck is very deep tho!

It was so pretty and fit wellm thought is would be better with a bathing suit or cardigan - it didn't cover the boobs very well on the outside. It was comfortable and the casual look was adorable - I think it would be super cute with a jean jacket.

links_reviews_title: Perfect to dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: I worn this many times during a beach vacation I went on. Perfect for a day of roaming around or as a beach cover up. The over all fit of this dress was very loose and baggy. I wish I would have sized down
WOW LOVE DONT CHANGE ANYTHING EVER MIGHT BUY IT!
Great little summer day dress. I paired with the FP Adella slip dress and it was perfect. Some of the threads unraveling on the dress, but I think that is how it's meant to be.

I wore this a lot! The shorts are SHORT but I bought it and released the seams that keep it rolled up and gained about an inch by doing that. It has a lot of gold detailing, so if you are into that you will love!
Easy to put on and take off (which for a well hydrated person wearing a romper is very important!) I am keeping this for sure.

I loved this romper! Wore on back to vacations in Islamorada where i dressed it down w flats, and in Baha Mar where i wore it with gold heels. I got so many compliments! I’m 5’9” and it wasn’t too short in the toro, which is hard to find. I’ll definitely rent again and buy next time!

links_reviews_title: Cute but too short and tight for me to wear out
links_reviews_text: Very cute. Nice weight. I didn’t feel comfortable wearing it out as it was very short.

Very cute! But super short. Some of you ladies may love that but my arse was practically hanging out. Not my thing. Maybe if I’d worn it with nude fishnets I would’ve liked it. I’m also talk 5’8” so it may not be too bad on shorter girls. Also I had to iron it. The cuffs were all messed up
This is really cute, but I couldn’t wear it because my hips/butt is too big! FP usually runs so large, but this is more on the fitted side.
Loved this romper! Great fit
i love jumpers but sometimes they look like a costume. worn right and this one does not

links_reviews_title: Wanted it to be a little cuter
links_reviews_text: It was ok. Don't have any strong critique but it just didn't work the best for me
Perfect for casual occasions. I usually struggle with rompers because they are too short in the body (I have a long torso) however this fit perfectly in both length and around the hips/waist.

This romper fit me perfectly! Normally i'm wary of anything free people since they typically run large, but this romper was just right! Highly recommend for anyone on the shorter side! I paired it with white booties and got a ton of compliments.
I liked this a lot, but my husband thought it was bizarre. I only wore it once bc the fabric is heavy, not easy to find a day that is hot enough for shorts and cool enough for sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for tall people
links_reviews_text: This romper is adorable and would be perfect for someone a few inches shorter than me (I’m 5’8”). Every time I reached for something I’d get a wedgie! Lol

links_reviews_title: Too small, esp for long torsos and anyone with a butt.
links_reviews_text: Way too small! Rides up the crotch.

links_reviews_title: Don't know what I did without this...
links_reviews_text: I am so obsessed with this romper. I have worn it so much. It's so comfortable and the color is perfect on me, as I am pale with strawberry blonde hair and blue eyes. It's super comfortable and even though the shorts are short, I don't feel exposed wearing it. It's super easy to take on and off. Can't wait to keep wearing it!
It’s super cute, but it’s really short. Like couldnt wear in public short.
Wore this romper out in Miami and it was a HUGE success. For sure quite short but that made them v. sexy for a night out. It was also lighter than I expected so it worked out great in hot weather.
Loved this romper! It did ride up a little, so if between sizes or a long torso I would size up. So comfy.

I was really worried about this not fitting me, but it was PERFECT! I love that its a heavier fabric, it feels very sturdy. And the army green color is perfect with all the gold accents. I wore it with a lot of gold jewelry!
Felt a little "uniformish" when I wore it, but fit and was comfortable.
I am normally a size 6 but this was way too tight around the middle and hips. If you're a size 6 with less curves it might work out fine, anyone with curves should size up

The first time I wore it I had the whole outfit and accessories picked out ahead of time so I put effort into looking good and felt very cute the whole day. After that, I started just throwing it on after the shower to go run errands or toss it on when I was running late and needed a last minute outfit (to literally anywhere) because its just so easy.

This was such a fun romper for the end of summer. The shorts are very short (in true Free People fashion) but since the romper isn't too tight I think it worked. The fabric is heavier than I expected so I wouldn't recommend this for the height of summer. I sized up since I'm tall and find that most rompers are too short in the torso in my usual size. I'm glad I did! There are adjustable tabs at the waist that allow you to cinch in the waist.

This utility-suit could not have been more comfortable. My favorite feature was the adjustable straps on the side so you can tighten/loosen the waist to your desired fit. It was a super soft and lightweight material.
This was cool piece and East to wear.
wore so many times, runs a little over sized
Could have ordered one size down, but this jacket was massively cute! Great to throw over any kind of outfit.

I wanted to love this jacket and was planning on buying, however, it didn't look as great on as it did in the picture. It's longer than I thought, which worked for me since I am tall but it might not work for everyone.

Wore this everywhere, was especially useful for Miami’s rainy weather this month. You can wear it with a hoodie or hide the hoodie with the zipped in option. Loved the Blue details on the cuffs. Wore this to work with jeans and a blouse or out for errands over bike shorts and a tank top. Lovedddd and want to buy!

links_reviews_title: Very cute but runs too large
links_reviews_text: This is a very cute item. I wore it multiple times even though it was too big for me. If I rent this again i ll get an S. I am usually an M but this item definitely runs large. I am 5'4'' and this came down all the way to my knees.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and works in light rain
links_reviews_text: This fit well. I mostly used the first couple of snaps to close and had a great shape to it. I wore in light rain

links_reviews_title: A good idea but too large and dumpy
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this but it is really oversized. I am usually a size 14 and the XL was huge. The sleeves were so long it was annoying and every time I tried to pair it with an outfit I just felt like I was wearing oversized men's clothing. The fabric and the style are cute though, just be sure to size down at least a few sizes if you don't want to be swimming in it.
I love this jacket! It goes with everything and lightweight too. Love the pops of blue and the style. Tip: Not for weather below 50.
Great fall jacket. I love all of the deep pockets also! Light weight- will not keep you warm.
xoxo
I wanted to love this so bad, I have a very small chest and it still looked so awkward on me. I don't think anyone thats full up top could wear this.
I twirl like a million times on this dress! Very comfy, true fit and beautiful dress. Perfect for a nice afternoon!

The dress is very pretty. It looked rather worn to me and was a lot more material than I was expecting so not the perfect fit for a beach vacation but I did wear it one evening to dinner anyway. It's definitely pretty!
Love the color/pattern, but the fabric was thin and seemed a little faded/worn from use. Made it feel cheap. The fit was as expected, possibly a little small in bust, but overall pretty standard.

links_reviews_title: Wanted a Mamma Mia vibe... but it was October & cold
links_reviews_text: To be fair - this is a cute dress & I should have worn it July with a little bit of a tan and some beachy hair in Mykonos or something. (A girl can dream). I ordered it in October and was not feeling the tropical/Mediterranean glamour I had envisioned, so I never wore it. BUT I will say that the shoulder ties and bust fit a little weird as well.
This dress was cute and fun for a weekend day out at the park. I styled it with a hat & some sneakers.
Really wanted to love this dress but the bust tight and too small.
such a cute pattern and super flattering. Loved wearing this dress!!

Love the style and print, but it didn’t work on my body type. It was pretty loose all over. I’d definitely size down if you have an hourglass shape, because it looked like a nightgown on me. I think I’ll rent again, but go down a size.

Really wanted to love this dress, but the straps are really strange. Like one person said it feels like the sides should be the front and back? I ended up wearing like a halter which is the beauty of tying like you want, I suppose. Amazing fabric and color though.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not the best fit
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress a few times and overall I liked it, but it was indeed tight in the chest (granted, I'm usually a S but they only had XS, which typically works for me.) Definitely more of a maxi. Lightweight-yay! Really fun full skirt, but I feel like the scoop neck is not the most flattering.

Wanted to love thus dress. It’s a beautiful print and nice fabric but the neckline is just not right. I tried to wear this so many ways and ended up just needing to wear a bralette under for coverage. The neck is narrow, but low armholes that cut in and show too much. I forced myself to wear since I had it already. Think you just need to be small chested, or maybe wear layer with something overtop
Fits well. Flattering. Easy to run around after a kid at the playground. The straps are a bit fussy but the fact that you tie them yourself helps with the fit so overall no complaints.
A very pretty and easy dress to throw on and go for summer.

The stress is beautiful but I found the fit to be awkward. It seemed like the cut made the dress and felt like the dress sides should have been the front and back but they were seams there so I knew that wasn't the case. I also felt like the dress ran big like other Free People dresses tend to do.
I loved this dress, it fit really well, and I got a lot of compliments on it. It was easy to wear, and looked elevated.
This dress was so cute and comfy, I wore it multiple times! I'm 4'11 and I was able to tie the straps up so it wasn't too long. Literally loved it!

Loved this dress! In fact, I will be ordering my own dress of this style in a different color way. It's a great length and really comfortable, but also very cute. Really great summer dress and you can wear it to the beach, school, work or just around the city. Definitely recommend.

Wore this a handful of times, it's so comfortable and perfect for any summer occasion! Wore to lunch with friends, a family party, and a dinner party. Paired it with strappy nude sandals and a wicker cross-body. Have considered purchasing because I love it so much!

I was so excited to rent this dress because it looked so easy and breezy. The material is lightweight, but there is a LOT of fabric in the skirt. It didn't hang on me the same way as the model, definitely more full and maxi-like (it came exactly to my ankles). The bias cut made it a little tricky to get the top situated, but once I tied the straps tighter it fit better.

Love this dress! The blue floral pattern is just as striking as it looks in the photos. I'm normally a medium in Free People because their pieces tend to be oversized in my opinion. I went with the Large and i'm glad I did because of the bust.

Love the colors and feel of this piece, but it is definitely more of a tunic than a dress. I assumed it would be okay as a dress like the model wore it, but I am 5’3 and it was far too short to be worn without pants. Because it is such a loose fit, once I put pants underneath, it just looked frumpy and awkward.
Wore this to a pool party, which it was perfect for. Babydoll cut, so it runs very “wide”. Colors are pretty ... but this isn’t a WOW piece. Kind of meh!
This dress is super fun. Wore it on vaca! It was very short and boxy if you like that look. Material is not breathable for hot weather.

This dress is ridiculously wide, abnormally wide. I think it could have been cute but it was unwearable due to the wideness. I ordered a medium and could have fit two of my bodies inside (and I have a big chest).

This is a very cute everyday dress, it definitely runs big but it's in a very beachy/effortless way. I ordered this dress for a cruise and it's going to be great to throw on a run around in! I'm 5'4, 150 pounds and I ordered a Small
Cute dress, but very loose and large, I would recommend sizing down. Also see through. I still ended up wearing it a few times though and gots lots of compliments :)
This dress was cute and easy to throw on. I loved that it had pockets but I thought that it was a little see through and the neckline was quite wide so it was constantly falling off of my shoulders.
I'm 5'4" and it was perfect dress length! very see through - definitely need a slip underneath
Great as a top over leggings and even greater as a dress!
Love this tunic! Kept it casual with some flare jeans and sandals. Got tons of compliments! perfect for the end of summer.
Great piece to just thrown on and head to the farmers market or the beach. It's so light, flowy and flattering.

links_reviews_title: A little too long to wear as a tunic top
links_reviews_text: Such a fun tunic top. It was just a bit to short for me to wear as a dress and too long to wear as a top. This top is so versatile. If it was 2 to 3 inches shorter, I could see myself wearing this with shorts, flares, bootcut, skinny, crops. Did not work for me but still would 100% recommend.

links_reviews_title: Not a top-the perfect dress for a petite girl
links_reviews_text: I want to start off by saying I freaking LOVE this dress and want to purchase it to own. It is easy, breezy, effortless and the perfect summer dress. I got so many compliments and felt really pretty even on a hot sweaty day. 5/5 stars!! No pics here as I am planning on rewearing it a thousand times before I sadly give it back- shhh :)

links_reviews_title: Cute summer dress for petite ladies!
links_reviews_text: Loved this casual frock! Despite reviews saying it runs large, I stuck with my usual size. Being just shy of 5'5", I wore this as a dress, but I can see those with a taller frame finding it too short. Although it can look a bit boxy, I dressed it up with a pair of platforms and it was perfect for a humid summer day. Fabric is a bit sheer, so you may need to wear a slip underneath! Definitely making this a summer staple in my closet.
This was cute in theory and looks adorable on the model -- but at 5'3", I was swimming in it! I had planned on wearing it with OTK boots, but never got the chance to.
Runs big, looks like I’m wearing a giant trash bag. Not flattering at all.
a very boxy dress, it just didn't do anything for my figure and was a heavier material. Additionally, my chest was too broad for it.
Love 💕 such a cute little black dress. Was able to wear a long sleeve underneath and was still roomy. Thought about buying this one

This is the second time I rented this dress, but in a different color. I decided to size down and get the small for my second rental. Overall great piece that can be dressed up or down(black version).

links_reviews_title: Cute, fun, and easy! Perfect weekend dress.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress so much! The cut is oversized yet flattering, and so easy to throw on. I wore it on a family trip to Las Vegas and wore it with a mustard bralette, pendant necklace, and birkenstock sandals. It does go pretty low on the arm holes, so it really needs a bralette with it.

The dress looks really cute in the photos but in real life, the material is extremely thick making it very heavy and in my opinion unflattering. The ruffle on the bottom also makes you look larger than you are, and the like the other reviews mention, the arm hole are large, so most bras show underneath.

This was an odd size and ended up looking boxy on me. I wore it, but I don’t think I would wear a dress shape like this again. It needs a bralette too because it cuts over a little bit in the sleeves.

This dress is a thick material and I feel the model photo accurately depicts the sizing of the dress. It’s supposed to run large for a loose whimsical look. I did get a lot of compliments on the one day I wore this dress, but there is major side boob! Also ordered my true size since I figured a small would’ve been too short.

I didn't end up wearing this piece because as the other reviews note, it's huge in the arm holes! I was expecting it to be a little big and I usually love a loose shift dress, but I seriously looked like I was wearing an XL in this S. I even tried it with a Free People lace bralett but it just looked sloppy. The fabric of the dress was worn looking, like it has had a lot of wear.

I really liked this dress in theory, its super cute. However, I never wore it because it is made of a heavy material that would have been too hot for midday sun and does not have enough coverage for being a little cold at night (I live in Colorado and we have had drastic temperature swings lately). I also could not wear it to work as I thought I would, because this dress shows a lot of sideboob. Super promising, but disappointed.
The shape of this dress is super cute and flattering, but runs a little big and the armholes are way too low. Bra will show no matter what you wear, which I have to wear one.

links_reviews_title: Cute online but looks like a sack in person
links_reviews_text: Wish I ordered an XS because the only place this dress fit me was the chest. It looked super large on me and was not flattering.
Easy, cute and comfortable to wear in the summer. The arm holes are on the wide side so I wore it with a cute bralette that I didn't mind being seen.
Not a fan of the fabric!
soooo comfy!
I liked the idea of this dress but since I am short (5'4") it just looked like a bag on me. If you are tall then this is the dress for you!
The arm holes were way too big on me. It is so cute but it was too much work trying to wear and layer in a flattering way.

links_reviews_title: Cute Casual Dress for Spring/ Fall
links_reviews_text: Overall, the dress fit true to size. I would say anyone 5'5" and above can get away with their true size, but shorter ladies may need to size down!
I love the look of this dress but ordered the wrong size :( it runs pretty large so I would go down a size. Would be super cute if it fit!

links_reviews_title: cute, comfortable and a little sexy
links_reviews_text: I wore this as a tunic over leggings and it's very cute and comfortable. The arm holes are a little large so you'll have to pick the right bra for the top. The pattern detail on the fabric is also a plus!

Beautiful color. Fun, easy summer dress. Cut wide and low in the arm hole area so a cute bralette/bra is a must. Everywhere else runs true to size.

Recommend!

Love this dress, I wore it for daytime and nighttime events. I love the frills!
This dress fit really well and was super comfortable. I wore it to work with sandals and then went out for drinks with friends after, was great for day to night!

Some of the seams were fraying a little bit but not too noticeably. Otherwise, flattering cut and fun color for a hot day outside.

I wore this dress to work and received 5 compliments by 9am! The color is a really flattering, pretty orange. The fabric is silky and drapes beautifully. The stretch through the middle comfortably accommodated by 20 week pregnant belly. I'll very likely rent this dress again post pregnancy.

but were way too big all around! Will reorder again with a smaller size
loved these white jeans, but was able to wear them a few times and feel like I got my fix - just what rental is for ;)

Fits as expected

For white denim these are legit!!! Thick enough for no show, but comfy enough to wear all day. They fit super cute & love the buttons. Wanted to buy, but hard to pay that price. Might’ve been worth it though

links_reviews_title: Never was a white jeans girl
links_reviews_text: ...until now. I surprised myself by how often I wore these. Very durable. They are going to get dirty (they are white after all), but everything literally came out in the wash. The button fly really makes the look.

I loved these jeans! They worked with so many different outfits and were a great change from black or blue jeans. I loved the button up fly and found their cut to be extremely flattering PLUS they weren't see through. I would absolutely recommend trying.

COH fits me like a glove, and the brand seems to be problematic for some other people, but they are the best fitting denim brand on me. I'm very straight up and down and have an athletic build but am not too bulky. I bought these because I wore them so much and knew I'd wear the crap out of them. I can't wait to keep wearing them!
To small all around

links_reviews_title: Great - in the right size on the right person

links_reviews_title: Love the buttons, but boot cut is not for me.

Fit was off but I have thick legs and waist was too big

Jeans are tricky - even though I liked the style of these and thought the denim seemed high-quality, they just didn't work on my body type.

links_reviews_title: Olivia Exposed Fly High-Rise Ankle Jeans
links_reviews_text: Super cute! A little tight at first but they were awesome
Fits as expected
I really wanted to keep these. So many compliments! They fit just right and hug in all the right places

links_reviews_title: Amazing Fit and Real Vintage Feel

I liked these, but wished they were slightly longer. They were more cropped on me than the model. Got them in my usual size and they fit great.
Cute cut, seems to run a bit small in the waist.

These jeans fit like they were nearly two sizes smaller than the label. I ordered my normal COH size so not sure if the ones I received were mismarked, but based on the reviews here there seems to be a fair bit of inconsistency. I have no clue how they sized these but was a joke couldn't get over my butt.

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans, but did not fit

These run small. Could not wear them.
I wore these every day. They're perfectly high-rise, but were a little short on my legs.

wish i ordered a size up from my normal. These jeans are NOT stretchy so they fit all through my legs but when it got to my waist, i couldn't even button them. If i got a size up, I would've loved these.
I loved these jeans. I am still contemplating buying them

Loved these. Fit perfectly. Looked lovely.
I love these jeans they fit but aren't too tight, deff a relaxed fit! So cute got so many compliments!
Structured high waisted denim that feels very high quality! One of my favorite pairs of pants 🤩 wore them with a we the free oversized sweater.
A must have pair of jeans for ankle boots!

Fit and length are perfect. The thickness of the material makes it feel like a true jean but the only down side is that after wearing them a few times they weirdly stretched out from the thigh crease.. It was weird.

I loved these. Very flattering and love the fit and design.

I loved this top! The color is great and the style of the top is flattering. I found that it ran a little small in the arm holes and the waistband was a little stretched out but otherwise it was great.

Cute top. Flattering
For a tall lady, I would steer clear of this piece. It was really tight in the arm pits and cut in the wrong places. Just generally I was not a fan.

Loved the color, style, and fit. The buttons behind the neck were hard to button/unbutton.

Was good for a selfie haha but that’s the only place I wore it. I hate strapless bras and mine looked saggy when I wore it with this shirt. If you don’t have boobs and wanna go braless, you’d love this shirt.

I couldn't even button the neck and I thought it was way too short. The fabric wasn't really like what it looked like in the photo. I would have still worn it if it was just the color and the length, but I was choking myself trying to button it.

Beautiful fabric, fit well just a little short for my liking, perfect for high waist pant. Great summer fall transition color. Loved the cut and style with loose waist front tie.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't find a place to wear it

I love this top!! The material and color are beautiful in person!

So lovely! I wouldn't have normally purchased this color so it was fun to try it out! I got lot's of compliments. The fabric is nice and overall the shirt is very well made. I wore it with high-waisted pants.
Didn’t love the length of the top...being tall it felt too cropped compared to what it shows in the picture

Love! Wore on my birthday and it was very flattering and comfortable. Shows off shoulders and collar bone area and fit amazing. Great fabric, with subtle details. Would definitely recommend!
it was fine. the sweater was nice and received compliments but overall it was just fine.

Looked super cute on, but at the end of the day it just wasn’t my style and I couldn’t figure out how to wear it
I would've enjoyed this more if I got one size down. It is the perfect work top. Loved the pockets.

links_reviews_title: Great, luxurious material but difficult fit.

looks nice under a blazer. The tie is a little bulky

I felt like the shirt may lose some of its structure after a couple more washes/weeks of wear.

Comfortable but not as flattering as I would have hoped
Perfect for everywhere-work, weekend, etc. This is polished, super soft & comfortable

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work and night time

I sized down based on reviews and it fit great. I wore this a bunch for work and was super happy with it!
This was a cute style. I wore a cute lace cami under, which peeked out of the v. The fabric was kind of thick but I still like it.

LOVED this top! Super chic and flattering! It's a thick material so definitely good for this time of year as summer winds down and it's getting cooler. Definitely recommend!
This top is so beautiful! It’s a thick sweater material, which is makes it perfect for a chilly office. Looked great paired with dark jeans.
Love this but it is def geared toward fall. Fill well everywhere, very flattering

links_reviews_title: Pretty colors, but big and shapeless

Really liked this dress. I wore it casually with sandals and wedges for work and weekend - but you could dress it up. Low cut - had to wear a cami.
Great colors, neckline is low but not too revealing. The fit is interesting. A lot of extra fabric up top.

it was flattering! comfy and I loved it

I wore this one night on my honeymoon and absolutely loved how it transitioned from day to night! you can easily dress it down with white tennis shoes or dress it up with espadrilles or nicer sandals. It was extremely comfortable and soft!

links_reviews_title: Ran a bit short in length on me; fun pattern;great style

The fit was a little odd and the print too much. Wouldn't recommend.

The dress was super comfy but not the most flattering on my more petite frame. It fell a bit long but that definitely didn’t stop me from wearing it! I mostly styled it as I did in the picture with white vans and a hat.

Size wise, I went down one, so that it would not be too billowy. The tie in the back made the smaller size a perfect fit!

Little too much room in the bust but it was manageable.

links_reviews_title: Runs large, but looks great as an intentional oversize piece
links_reviews_text: This dress is a great, light fabric with a great print! It runs a bit large, but the waist belt accentuates the waist well, allowing the rest of the dress to flow well. It creates a great waist silhouette with an intentional oversize look!

This dress is very pretty and comfortable. The material is great and I wanted to love it, but the neckline is very, very low. I ordered a size down after reading reviews on the Anthro website, but even with that, the neckline was still far too low. I didn't want to not wear it, so I ended up wearing a tank top under it which was ok but I much would have preferred not to have to do that. If you have a smaller chest this might fit better, but I would definitely recommend sizing down.
Runs fairly large

A must-rent for sure!
Wore to bridal shower - received many compliments. Easy to ear and comfortable too. pleated skirt but not overwhelming.
